translations: [医] 夸希奥科病；恶性营养不良病

sentences.sentence: Kwashiorkor survivors did not overeat in this way.
sentences.translation: 夸希奥科病幸存者并不这样吃得过多。

sentences.sentence: Kwashiorkor survivors did not overeat in this way.
sentences.translation: 得过夸希奥科病的人就不会这样暴饮暴食。

sentences.sentence: Symptoms normally manifest themselves in one of two ways, known as marasmus and kwashiorkor.
sentences.translation: 通常这些人们的症状以两种方式之一显露出来，即消瘦症或夸希奥科病。
